name: Exploding Marbles
description:
Exploding Marbles

A game where you smash into marbles while avoiding bombs

Controls Keyboard

W, or ↑,  Move in direction you are pointing
A, or ←, Turn left
D, or →, Turn right
S, or ↓, Brake

Game pad

RT, Move in direction you are pointing
Left Joystick, Turn left or right
LT, Brake
